notes: ChatVideoPro v3.0 introduces full Video-to-Video support (SAM3 Roto, Reshoot, Lucy Edit, and the brand-new Kling 01, and Kling 2.6), next-gen thumbnail mode with blueprint presets, multi-image prompting, new image models including Flux 2 SeeDream 4.5 and Z-Image Turbo, Element references for consistent generations, and an upgraded Color Grading Assistant with on-the-fly LUT creation + reference matching. Our biggest, most powerful update yet.
